Posts.Content: CBA9577 wrote: I got my first callback had a 3d mammogram and have to go back for further diagnosis? Most of the info I see on distortions revolve around prior biopsies and surgeries. I have had none..I read that most cancers grow in the outer quadrant. I am really concerned about the size 8cm x 5cm. Does that mean I could have a tumor that large? FINDINGS: There is scattered fibroglandular tissue. RIGHT BREAST: There is new subtle architectural distortion in the right upper outer quadrant spanning about 8 x 5 cm. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 3d mammogram new architectural distortion no prior surgeries CBA9577 Toad
